channel.title: Authors on Fuzz Technology
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Fuzz Technology

item.title: Eric Olson
item.description: Erico Olson is founder of Polestar Analytics, a boutique consulting firm advising security product vendors, managed service providers and their enterprise clients on threat intelligence, business analysis and product strategy.

item.title: Nick Selby
item.description: Nick Selby is founder of Fuzz Technology. He is co-host, with Chris Swan, of the Tech Debt Burndown podcast.
